original_text: Speak, I pray you, in the ears of all the men of Shechem, Whether is better for you, either that all the sons of Jerubbaal, which are threescore and ten persons, reign over you, or that one reign over you? remember also that I am your bone and your flesh.
korean_text: 청하노니 너희는 세겜의 모든 사람들의 귀에 말하라 여룹바알의 아들 칠십 명이 다 너희를 다스림과 한 사람이 너희를 다스림이 어느 것이 너희에게 나으냐 또 나는 너희와 골육임을 기억하라 하니

sentences.original_text: in the ears of all the men of Shechem
either that all the sons of Jerubbaal
which are threescore and ten persons
or that one reign over you?
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 한 사람이 너희를 다스리는 것인가?

sentences.original_text: that I am your bone and your flesh.
